author: Isreal Mathew
comment: This is a good design, I like the interactive weather and showing the two battery levels. Despite the interactive setting being turned off, it still changes the color when I tap at the bottom... It also doesn't obey the option to not show taps... that setting is also off yet I still see the circle where I tap.
title: Good design but fix/stop the colour tap

author: Mark Haven
comment: This was my go to face, but the recent android wear up date now causes the watch face to momentarily go back one color then reset to the colors I have chosen. Its a small thing but incredibly annoying. Please fix this and I will restore my 5 star review.
title: Was fantastic until last update

author: scott smith
comment: Color changes on tap need to have an option to disable. You set a color with no way to save it and then it's gone by an accidental tap. Time in ambient mode falls behind sometime up to three minutes before catching up. It's not worth even being there if the time is incorrect. Only watch face I've ever seen do this.
title: Nice but with major flaws

author: Carl Dicks
comment: Really do like this and will be my go-to face. Only criticism is that there needs to be a disable for the touch to change colour and a screen dim setting for ambient mode. If that was implemented then 5 stars for sure.
title: Huawei watch

author: Roman Ayrapetov
comment: Looks great but what is this crap with color change on tap? Totally ruins it. Why have a crazy color customizer when you can't even keep it? Would rate 5 otherwise.
title: Get rid of color change on tap

author: project_nemesis_78
comment: My smart watch is the very first one I've owned and I'm glad I found one of many faces for my zen watch. I really like the functionality of this face.it doesn't throttle down my watch when I use it. I'm very happy with it. I hope they keep up the good work because making an app for smart watches or phones even is a hard thing to do. Believe me I've made a few apps myself for personal use designed specifically for my rooted HTC one m8. Keep up the good work and thank you for such a great app for my watch. :)
title: Asus Zen Watch

author: Johnathan Branson
comment: Good watch face, but when you first turn on your watch screen, the color changes for a second before going to the color you've chosen. Would be 5 stars it not for this annoyance. Also, for some reason it always displays my phone battery as 85%. It never changes

author: Ugur Turemis
comment: How do you stop the colour change, I stopped the intractive actions. However it still changes colour on tap
title: Yo HoHoHo

author: Isaac Lalezari
comment: I like the look and the option to change some colors on it.  However,  the weather is not correct!!! nor updating!  I tried all 3 providers.  Please fix.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi Issac,

please make sure that GPS on you phone is ON.

Regards

title: Like it but...

comment: For some reason there is no "disable color change on screen touch" Not sure why but I'm sure it will be added. Rating will change at that time to 5*
title: One of the best but...

author: ryan baxter
comment: Wish they would tell you when u download an app your buying it doesn't work for your phone or gear    Samsung users get watch-master it's unlimited supply of watch faces 6$ is so worth it   and as soon as I get my 99.cents back I'll change my rating to a 5 stars thank you

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Please, send us an Order Number via email.

title: Not for Samsung gear s2

author: Lotfi Jabber
comment: Drains battery really quickly but love the face hopefully battery improvements follow so I can use it as my daily
title: Love the watch gave but battery hog

author: Eli The Drummer Guy
comment: Love the face just wish it wouldn't change colors just by tapping on it. Even with the interactive turned off it still changes when tapped.

author: Addisu Getachew
comment: It is nice app! However, all faces are round would be nice if you add all faces in rectangular or square as my watch is Asus zenwatch2 which is a rectangular in shape!
title: Nice

author: Tony
comment: Disable touch option doesn't work, color still changes unintentionally, would like a full color ambient option also
title: Almost prefect

author: Tony C
comment: Please allow us to disable the color change on tap, ruins it for no reason what so ever
title: Great but...

author: N8 Gee
comment: Beautiful watchface. Once they update to not change color on tap will change my rating

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi Nathan,

Just opet configuration app and unselect "Enable interactive actions".

Regards

title: Beautiful

author: Cosmin Gaman
comment: Any chances that u will add an option for full ambient mode? Not a fan of dim mode :)
title: Nice watch face

author: Digby Harris
comment: Great app with great watch faces and i haven't had the problems the other users have had

author: Daniel Cardoso
comment: But needs full ambient mode
title: Nice watch face

author: Lee Nails
comment: Fully customizable, great for mickey mouse fans.
title: Works great on LG Urbane 2 Lte

author: Jack Cai
comment: I found this really drains battery
title: It's ok

author: Andrew Johnson
comment: Looks nice but burns battery fast

author: Ann Ferguson
comment: Love the watchface but with my lg urbane the app drains the battery down fast!!!

author: Dale Flintall
comment: Really loving it, I wish I could save my settings though. Saving presets would be sweet.
title: Really nice

author: ken mcpherson
comment: I have purchased two or three of these people's watch faces.  They look nice but they all have one issue that really bugs me and the issue is that whenever you lift your wrist to look at the time and the face activates, all of the hands spin all the sudden to set themselves to the correct time.  It looks very tacky and is  irritating and I have not seen any other watch faces from other developers that do this.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi Ken,

You can always disable an animation in the companion app if you really bugs you this feature.

Regards

title: Nice looking but...

author: Jose Medina
comment: Very functional watch face, as always that has come to be expected from his impressive collection. Ambient mode is awesome and still able to deliver the time and all the functions it comes with. Is a must get!! Looks stunning from a lg watch r.
title: As always, the developer delivers

author: Mark Booker
comment: Very nice layout with some nice customisation options
title: Clean clear watchface

author: Tudor Munteanu
comment: Notification covers the time in ambient mode. Should have options for font sizes, position of battery / time / weather.
title: Time

author: John S
comment: I know it's designed for round watches but can you tweak it for square ones too? It looks very nice still.
title: I like it.

author: Sam Absi
comment: Really liked it but it didn't look the best on my Asus Zen watch which has a square face
title: Very good for a round faced watch

author: Josh AR
comment: Why you can't also make a square face available I don't know. All that has to be done is to remove the circular border.
title: Square watchface?

author: Renier Pienaar
comment: On a S7 with an LG Smartwatch R , the face does not appear in the list of selectable faces, please fix and I will purchase again ;-)
title: Please fix

author: Erdinc Rizakyazim
comment: Ok, I purchased this... But how to install it.. There is no any info..

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, it supports  only Android Wear devices.

title: Sony SmartWatch 2
